description:
Sway is a new Office content aggregation and presentation application from Microsoft. With more than 2,500 signups per day, it can become the most popular online presentation tool in 2015. Do not wait. Learn how to use Sway!

Sway allows users to combine text and media to create a presentable website. Learn how to get started, create a unique on-line presentation in minutes. You will get a chance to see more advanced features and upcoming modules and ideas in action as well.

  • What is Sway all about
  • Main competitors
  • How to create an account
  • Designing your first presentation
  • How to customize a project
  • More advanced features

Contents and Overview

In 60 minutes of content including several short and informative lectures, this course covers the basics of Sway, its interface and features. It is all you need to get started and design an awesome on-line presentation.

Join now! It is FREE!
title: Microsoft Office Sway - a PowerPoint replacement made easy
